Content:: Nirmala Kotalawala MP (born 29 September 1965) was Sri Lanka's Deputy Minister of Highways and a Member of Parliament representing the Kalutara Electoral District. He was a student at Nalanda College Colombo. In 1997 he was elected Chairman of the Pradeshiya Saba Dodamgoda, a position for which he held for two years. Kotalawala was also a member of the Western Provincial Council between 1999 and 2004.  This article about a politician from Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub.
